channel.title: [PI] Skill animations [PI]
channel.description:
Ok, I've asked this a couple of times but I was in another state, and I just got home, and I couldn't find my question, so I'll ask it again.
When you do a skill, like fishing, you do an animation which is bending down to put the net in the water. Well, if you walk away while doing this, you're STILL doing this while you walk. It stops when you teleport, but this annoys the hell out of me. Any ideas?

item.title: [PI] Skill animations [PI]
item.dc:creator: @David_The_Drummer David The Drummer
item.description:
@David_The_Drummer wrote:

Ok, I’ve asked this a couple of times but I was in another state, and I just got home, and I couldn’t find my question, so I’ll ask it again.

When you do a skill, like fishing, you do an animation which is bending down to put the net in the water. Well, if you walk away while doing this, you’re STILL doing this while you walk. It stops when you teleport, but this annoys the hell out of me. Any ideas?
